Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.breakout.policyengine

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBreakOutPolicyEngine
    A engine that makes policy decisions for a BreakOutBox .
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBreakoutPolicyEngine
    An abstract frame work that makes it easy to implement IBreakOutPolicyEngine.
    AbstractPolicyEngineMessageHandler
    An abstract message handler.
    BasePolicyAction
    A base class for actions returned by a policy engine.
    ExampleBreakOutPolicyEngine
    An example breakout policy engine.
    ExampleOrderCancelHandler
    An example handler for Order Cancel request messages.
    ExampleOrderCancelReplaceHandler
    An example handler for Order Cancel/Replace Messages.
    ExampleOrderHandler
    An example handler for order messages.
    HandlerContext  
    IDGenerator
    A simple ID generator, returns a new unique id on every call to IDGenerator.nextId().
    MessageAddedPolicyAction
    A policy action returned by IBreakOutPolicyEngine.onMessageAdded(com.camerontec.catalys.server.breakout.BrokenOutMessageData).
    NullHandler
    A null message handler.
    PerSessionIndices  
    RelatedMessagePolicyAction
    Action returned by IBreakOutPolicyEngine.determineRelatedMessageAction(com.camerontec.catalys.server.processor.IFIXMessageProcessor, com.camerontec.catalys.core.message.IFIXMessage).
